pkgmetadata.longdescription: Template for Clinical Trial Protocol // Contains an R Markdown template for a clinical trial protocol adhering to the SPIRIT statement. The SPIRIT (Standard Protocol Items for Interventional Trials) statement outlines recommendations for a minimum set of elements to be addressed in a clinical trial protocol. Also contains functions to create a xml document from the template and upload it to clinicaltrials.govhttps://www.clinicaltrials.gov/ for trial registration.
